programme.desc: This 30-minute broadcast special explores the journey of HOW TO TRAIN YOUR DRAGON from Dean DeBlois’ original vision of the beloved animated classic to his massively cinematic approach for the all-new live-action adaptation. Anchored by Mason Thames, Nico Parker, and Gerard Butler and featuring immersive footage from the set, audiences will join the cast & crew as they reveal the elaborate sets, cutting-edge technology, and passionate storytelling that helped to create the ultimate exhilarating, experiential, and emotional theatrical experience.

programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess

Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Mom is sick on a busy day at home, Tag offers to pick up the slack and take on her tasks for the day. But when Kit realizes she accidentally scratched up Frank and Beans’s tree, she, Tag and Scooch find a way to make it up to them.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. programme.desc: When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.desc: Adam learns to make authentic beef rendang from a local Muslim family. He visits the National Archives of Singapore to learn about his mother's family, and continues his search for inspiration for his Singapore banquet dinner.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam visits Peranakan food legend Violet Oon's restaurant, National Kitchen. He then heads to Chinatown to visit Aussie Dave Pynt's restaurant, Burnt Ends.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam goes in search of the best seafood that Singapore has to offer. His journey begins inside the Marina Bay Sands resort complex where many celebrity chefs have opened eateries.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Mena explores a charming host of plant-based Louisiana staples—vegan beignets, gumbo, biscuits and po boys—with food historian Zella Palmer and cookbook author Timothy Pakron. programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: A young Muhammad Ali clinched Olympic gold in 1960, but returned home to the same bigotry he’d left behind. Disillusioned, it’s said that he threw his medal into the Ohio River. Head to Kentucky and uncover the real story behind this legendary tale.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: Explore Bill Clinton's complex legacy, from Arkansas roots to White House highs (economic prosperity) and lows (scandals, impeachment), and his impact on American politics.

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: Wilt Chamberlain is the only NBA player to have scored a remarkable 100 points in a game. Investigate what happened to his 100-point ball. Then, examine a controversial Kentucky Derby trophy that may have been falsely identified.

programme.title: Battle Of Midway: The True Story
programme.desc: An inside look at the Battle of Midway, the aircraft used on both sides of the fight, and the dramatic story of one fighter pilot and his pivotal role in America’s first true victory of the Pacific War.

programme.title: Battle Of Okinawa In Color
programme.desc: Okinawa was the site of the last battle of the last great war of the 20th century, with a casualty rate in the tens of thousands. Through it all, military cameramen risked their lives to film the conflict, from brutal land combat to fierce kamikaze attacks at sea.

programme.title: Aerial Africa
programme.desc: Observe a land filled with geological phenomena whose majesty can only truly be appreciated from the sky. From forgotten shipwrecks strewn along the coastline to the unexplained fairy circles in Koakoveld, Namibia's secrets will be revealed.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own – Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. Our villains’ alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Klaus is injured and Veruca’s mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Veruca’s rekindled powers.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: During an ice storm, Speed Stingers infest Berk, driving the residents into hiding.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Paramedic Paranormal When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's Tidy Toyland Day and Noddy wants to win the Tidy Toyland Trophy. Unfortunately he's also invited the untidy Pirates round to play! Noddy has to figure out how he can play with the Pirates and win the Tidy Toyland Trophy.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light… having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Mom is sick on a busy day at home, Tag offers to pick up the slack and take on her tasks for the day. Tag handles it at first, but when the responsibilities start to stack up, she realizes that being Mom is much harder than she thought. \ Tag and Scooch are excited to get to know Kit, who has organized a bunch of cat-ivities for the day. But when Kit realizes she accidentally scratched up Frank and Beans’s tree, she, Tag and Scooch find a way to make it up to them.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: An adorable orphan named Li'l Pequena is revealed to actually be a changeling who altered the townspeople's memories and convinced them that she's been there all along

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When the gang chases Li'l Pequena into the portal, everyone but Puss gets super-powers and must join forces with a sorceress to overthrow the Blind King

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: In the wake of her grandfather's death, Lucky sets out to show the town his softer side and give him the goodbye he deserves.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy

The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. Not only does Brenner escape alive, she is also seething with rage and vows to hunt down all who murdered her husband and take revenge!

programme.title: Extreme Ends

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Cao’s enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Bei’s concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Finally Found Someone
programme.desc: Aprilyn who is left by his groom on the day of their wedding becomes viral online. Devastated, she meets Raffy who works at a PR agency hired by the father of the groom who will help her move on.

programme.title: Fantastica
programme.desc: The proprietor of a struggling carnival must help a prince from another land find three lost princesses.

programme.title: Seven Sundays
programme.desc: The Bonifacio siblings reunite when they find out their father is diagnosed with cancer. In the process, they have to deal with unresolved issues among themselves before it's too late.

programme.title: Moron 5.2: The Transformation
programme.desc: On one lonely night together, the five morons get struck by lightning and it gives them the impression that they've gained superpowers. With that they set out to prove their worth to their kids.

programme.title: Ang Pagsanib Kay Leah dela Cruz
programme.desc: A lady cop who moves into a small town gets drawn to a case that involves a girl that's possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Miss.. Gabi Na
programme.desc: At a young age, Adora (Ynez Veneracion) lost his father to a freak vehicular accident. The early demise of their father creates a strong bond between her siblings, but the time comes when she loses her sister to a group of spoiled, drug-crazed men.

programme.title: Of All The Things
programme.desc: Already falling for each other, Berns starts maneuvering things to help Umboy retake the bar exams as he battles his fears to reclaim his self-esteem.

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A prolific killer-for-hire finds solace and redemption after rescuing a teenage girl who was held captive by the man she was paid to kill.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Mahal
programme.desc: Lira (Kylie Verzosa), a prize-winning author, spends a week to finish her final novel. But when she meets Andrei (Zanjoe Marudo), a young documentarist, her plans start to change.

programme.title: Ang Panday
programme.desc: A young blacksmith realizes his destiny when a malevolent demon bent on ruling the world unleashes an army of creatures on humanity.

programme.title: MIA
programme.desc: Mia Salazar (Coleen Garcia), a self-destructive, alcoholic doctor who joined the Doctor to the Barrios program to heal from the tragedy of her fiance's death meets the cheerful and nerdy forester Jay Policarpio (Edgar Allan Guzman). Together, the two will embark on a new journey.

programme.title: Camp Sawi
programme.desc: A group of brokenhearted women end up at a resort that specializes in helping people ease their pain.

programme.title: Matalino Man Ang Matsing, Naiisahan Din!
programme.desc: Their personalities are as opposite as the two poles, and the worlds they respectively belong to be perpetually at odds. Gener (Eddie Garcia) is an accomplished policeman whose track record in solving crimes is exceptional, while Mando (Willie Revillame ) is a slick con man who has a knack at wearing disguises.

programme.title: ALF S2 E06 - Some Enchanted Evening
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: ALF S2 E07 - Oh Pretty Woman
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: ALF S2 E08 - Something's Wrong with Me
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: CSI S4 E19 - Bad Words
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: Contreras Gang
programme.desc: Contreras Gang

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Tatlo Silang Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Siamese triplets Brando, Butch and Bronson (TVJ) are forced to take in the newly-orphaned Nitoy (Niño Muhlach). The journey from downright hostility to tolerance to acceptance and finally to filial love is a fun adventure guaranteed to amuse everybody.

programme.title: Pablik Enemi 1 N 2: Aksidental Heroes
programme.desc: Redford White and Dennis Padilla team in this fast paced wacky adventure as two bumbling idiots on the run after accidentally picking up a suitcase full of smuggled goods.

programme.title: Sa Kabila ng Lahat
programme.desc: Dina Bonnevie was a famous television commentator whose work was focused on social issues particularly corruption in the government. However, because she was having an affair with a politician, who was helping her further her career, she turned a blind eye to his own evil deeds.

programme.title: Sa Hirap at Ginhawa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: In the story, a young couple eloped, got married and then must cope with problems like money, living on their own, trying to finish school and raising a baby.

programme.title: Demolisyon
programme.desc: This film presents the struggles of people to have a home of their own and the pain and the anguish they face when they are forced out of their homes and the shanties they thought they owned are demolished.

programme.title: Sa Totoo Lang
programme.desc: Some of the country's finest actors joined the fun in this witty and totally hilarious look into the sex lives of lower middle class women who were old and single or separated, widowed, grass widowed, fooling around and everything else you could think of plus the assortment of men they met, fell for, cheated on, disliked, feared or anything else.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Alam Mo Ba?
programme.desc: In his rush to escape from the policemen, Mario disguised himself as an Arab. At that same moment, Teresa was waiting for the Arab prince she was supposed to marry, whom she has never seen before. In the rush, she thought Mario was her prince and brought him home to meet her parents.

programme.title: Tatlong Anak, Isang Ama
programme.desc: Set in the city of Olongapo during the last days of the US bases in the Philippines, this is a tale about the life of a musician and his three sons by three different women.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Miss Universe ng Buhay Ko
programme.desc: Andrew E and his gang rescued the damsels in distress from a robbery accident. He gave them food and lodging in his humble home, hopeful that someday, Charlene, one of the girls he rescued, would learn to love him.

programme.title: Sagad Hanggang Buto
programme.desc: When his parents are killed by assassins in the family car, Banjo is adopted by the thief who took his dead parents' wallet. Raised in poverty and used to surviving with his wits, he grows up as the town's resident hoodlum.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Soho in London was formerly a town of immigrants. Long known as one of the most bohemian areas of London, Soho is considered the place for enjoying the arts, revelry, and late-night entertainment.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the early spring dates of Risshun and Usui. The nuns show us how to make the seasonal specialties neko-mochi rice cakes and Girls' Day crackers.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: Join us on a trip to Gifu, located near the center of Japan's main island, and experience its blossoming cherry trees, its snow-covered central mountains, and its inspiring people and traditions.

programme.title: Story Land in Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: Hamaura Ayano (a former Hello! Project artist who moved into acting and is now a solo singer) and BUDDiiS (a dance-and-vocal group with 10 unique members).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-11.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Hyper-modern Japanese kitchens are compact, comfortable spaces for cooking and eating. We look at the history and evolution of this space at the heart of every Japanese home.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Kitties love hanging out by the seaside in Ehime's pleasant, warm climate. See a kitty making rounds at an orange farm before finding some beautiful autumn foliage with the help of a kitty-guide.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: On the Wings
programme.desc: Embark on Japan's southernmost flight! Witness stunning low-altitude views and the challenges of pilots flying there!

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: On February 3, the Lunar New Year's Eve, various rites are held to expel calamity and welcome good fortune in the coming year.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Telling passengers in a hurry that they may be late. Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Trash Tribe is a band led by Oomote Fumiaki. Their instruments are made with marine trash. Fishing line and driftwood on strings. Plastic bottle percussion. Their laid-back music has fans of all ages.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: Chinese mother Yang Hu finds reassurance in a Japanese word that helps her connect with others while navigating cultural differences in Tokyo.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: In 2024, a team led by Saito Kentaro won the bronze trophy as well as a special prize at the prestigious Montreal International Fireworks Competition. He talks about what fireworks mean to him.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Brazilian Vanusa Santiago, a professional dancer who teaches samba in Kobe, Hyogo Prefecture, as well as American Kenneth Mukai, who runs a craft beer brewery in Niyodogawa, Kochi Prefecture.

programme.title: KAIZOKU: Seto Inland Sea
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Seto Inland Sea.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Many mountains in Japan that attract tourists are active volcanoes. Learn safety tips for climbing and the latest on eruption prediction research.

programme.title: Magical Japanese "Ship"
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to ships. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #41 Can we buy tickets? / To ask someone if you can do something, say the verb to indicate your desired action, followed by "koto ga" and "dekimasu," meaning something is possible. Then add "ka."

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Ren, from Vietnam, started a guesthouse in Nagano Prefecture. Her belief is: a welcoming environment leads to a more livable community. We take a look at interactions between Ren and the townspeople.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: This program highlights the "Osaka Month" feature aired in May, showcasing Osaka's food culture, such as udon and seafood. It also covers the NHK WORLD-JAPAN PR event at NHK Osaka.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Rob the Robot and his friends, Orbit, Ema, T.K., and Squeak, take adventures across the many amazing planets in the Robot Galaxy in a fantastical world of fun and imagination. Each mission requires the help or involvement of his friends and their unique abilities, be it T.K.’s logical thinking or Ema’s language and early reading knowledge. The adventures, while creative and fun, remain sufficiently rooted in “real life” experiences of preschoolers not only to intrigue and entertain but still make sense. Fun, laughter and learning are just a rocket - hop away!

programme.desc: This genre-bending series tackles some of the biggest problems facing Australian families today. From teens' sometimes-fraught search to find their tribe, to the all-pervasive effect of social media on children.

programme.title: Fancy Fruit - Plenty of Persimmons
programme.desc: Have you eaten a persimmon? If you haven't, you're not alone. And it's a sometimes-misunderstood fruit. Where better to go to learn that a Queensland orchard celebrating a record crop.

programme.title: Meet The Neighbours - Episode 1
programme.desc: Around 1 in 6 people living in regional Australia have experienced discrimination. This episode will follow Maryborough's newest residents into finding jobs, housing, settling into school and the local community.

programme.title: This Place - Leanganook: His Teeth
programme.desc: Leanganook or Mount Alexander, means 'his teeth'. Dja Dja Wurrung man, Trent Nelson shares its cultural significance and shows where the young men's ceremonies were held with the nearby Taungurung people.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend - Episode 48
programme.desc: When you need to know what's happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you today's events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 19
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel discuss Australia v South Africa in Cricket's World Test Championship Final, NSW will take a 1-0 series lead into State of Origin Game 2 in Perth, plus AFL, Super Rugby Semi-Finals and Super Netball.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 48
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Compass - The Wayside Weddings
programme.desc: Playwright Alana Valentine discovers the revolutionary church community in Kings Cross that offered her mother the chance of a second wedding when she was a divorcee in the 60s - the uniquely Australian Wayside Chapel.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight - Episode 48
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Aussie Mavericks - Hard Luck
programme.desc: On Darwin's outskirts a small community of Cambodian farmers produce food for local market stalls. Many fled the murderous Khmer Rouge regime. Meet the mango grower whose personal history is extraordinary and humbling.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals - Episode 3
programme.desc: The benefits to being social can far outweigh any desire for peace and quiet - exploring the importance of shared knowledge and group dynamics, these seemingly anti-social animals all benefit from having 'mates'

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - The Solomon Islands' SeaSistas
programme.desc: We join one of the first women to qualify as a surf instructor in the Solomon Islands as Nagarita and her team use their passion for surfing to empower girls by challenging stereotypes about men and women.

programme.title: The Role Of A Lifetime - Episode 3
programme.desc: This genre-bending series tackles some of the biggest problems facing Australian families today. From teens' sometimes-fraught search to find their tribe, to the all-pervasive effect of social media on children.

programme.title: Meet The Neighbours - Episode 1
programme.desc: Around 1 in 6 people living in regional Australia have experienced discrimination. This episode will follow Maryborough's newest residents into finding jobs, housing, settling into school and the local community.

programme.title: Next Gen Agriculture - Teen Farmers
programme.desc: The average age of the Australian farmer, at 52, is older than many other occupations. But a high school in regional Queensland is inspiring a new crop of farmers to step into their boots, and stage.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 7
programme.desc: It's season 2 and Derek still can't cook! With locally found ingredients, and a sprinkle of culture and character, Mark and Derek create an Indigenous-inspired feast for the people they visit along their journey.

programme.title: Good Tucker - Episode 3
programme.desc: This week Good Tucker head down the Great Ocean Road for a Greek dining institution

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Geoff Miers
programme.desc: We meet garden guru, Geoff Miers, who is known for celebrating the diverse and unique flora of arid Alice Springs..

programme.title: Landline - Episode 18
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 19
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel discuss Australia v South Africa in Cricket's World Test Championship Final, NSW will take a 1-0 series lead into State of Origin Game 2 in Perth, plus AFL, Super Rugby Semi-Finals and Super Netball.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 17
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 119
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 119
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 119
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Veggies and Eggs
programme.desc: Netflix's Chef's Table star Asma Khan and Gourmet Traveller editor Joanna Hunkin join Adam to take on two kitchen staples: veggies and eggs.

programme.title: This Place - Bila to the Garuwa
programme.desc: In Birpai country, the Gathang language is spoken. It has two words for river, "bila" and "dungang". The Hastings River is extremely important for the Birpai people, as it supplied plentiful food and a place to meet.

programme.title: ABC News Regional - Episode 20
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia - It's Time! (1960 - 1975)
programme.desc: The Australian Dream continues to evolve, as underrepresented Australians work to secure a sense of home and belonging for themselves and their families - whether it's equality or immigration reform, the fight has just begun.

programme.title: Heywire - Draven from Bunbury, WA
programme.desc: Heywire winner Draven is a boxer and a podcaster. He wants to raise the profile of wheelchair boxing so other people living in regional areas can train and compete.

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations - Mornington Peninsula and Exley
programme.desc: On the Mornington Peninsula, an overgrown sloping bush block is transformed into a family retreat designed to embrace its natural surrounds, while a heritage-listed mid-century classic home in Sydney gets a modern upgrade.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 101
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: A poor laborer father and his young son's lives are turned upside down when a fascinating and strange new pet enters their world. Amid the resulting comic mayhem, they ultimately learn a poignant lesson about the true nature of family and the things money can't buy.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

programme.title: Star Trek (2009)
programme.desc: A prequel focusing on a young James T. Kirk and Mr. Spock, chronicling their first meeting at Starfleet Academy and their first space mission.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: A poor laborer father and his young son's lives are turned upside down when a fascinating and strange new pet enters their world. Amid the resulting comic mayhem, they ultimately learn a poignant lesson about the true nature of family and the things money can't buy.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: Tchaikovsky's score, George Balanchine's choreograpy and Oscar®-winner Kevin Kline's narration combine to tell the timeless story of young Marie, who falls asleep after a Christmas party to dream that her gifts come to life.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: When a clerical error causes a clash in wedding dates, two best friends who'd do anything for each other find themselves in a no-holds-barred, take-no-prisoners struggle that threatens to erupt into all-out war.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: A poor laborer father and his young son's lives are turned upside down when a fascinating and strange new pet enters their world. Amid the resulting comic mayhem, they ultimately learn a poignant lesson about the true nature of family and the things money can't buy.

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Sparks fly and tempers flare as host Mona Scott-Young grills the original six participants, who reunite with Sheriff Dance and Chief Capehart for the first time since leaving the program.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Social media influencer Alexis Murphy was on her way to a hair appointment, but never arrived. When a photo of her abandoned car was posted online, her worried loved-ones knew something was terribly wrong.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A middle-aged woman holds a restaurant manager hostage. First responders hurry to locate a young woman who flipped her car. A married couple in Ohio defend themselves after an intruder enters their home.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Christine and Jason Harris fell in love young. Christina finds Jason caring and supportive and after marrying, they have two children. But then Christina makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A woman attacks a bus driver in an out-of-control road rage incident; a man is beaten to within an inch of his life in a hate crime; a woman is brutally assaulted by her ex in a dollar store. And more.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a Georgia college student disappears, police open an investigation into a possible hate crime and abduction. However, Dr. Jamie Downs uncovers evidence that spins the case in a new direction.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: One FBI undercover agent meets with suspects in Denmark in an effort to retrieve one of the world's lost treasures; another agent takes on an unlikely suspect believed to be planning a murder for hire.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Tales of toxic love triangles—wives who stray from their husbands with disastrous results, a deadly case of online catfishing, and a lonely young woman who has an affair with a killer.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Orion and Kendra are revealed to everyone, and tensions boil over when Jacob goes head to head with the other participants. Sheriff Dance and Chief Capehart reveal what lies ahead for PCDC.

Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.desc: Guia (Donnalyn Bartolome) transfers to a different neighborhood, meets new faces. New kasambahays, new masters and a whole new adventure packed with fun and laughter.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 10
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 1
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 5
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Boyong Mañalac, Hoodlum Terminator (Father's Day Special)
programme.desc: He used to be an outlaw, now, he is feared by the criminals. An action-filled chapter in the life of Boyong Manalac, on how he terminates the notorious hoodlums one by one in cold blood, and how this affects him and his family.

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 11
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: Encounter ep 18
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: Kalye Kweens ep 12
programme.desc: Mandy and Telly are former best friends who are now the leaders of neighboring communities that have been perennially in conflict. Their game of one-upmanship worsens when both their sons become best friends but are smitten with the same girl
